alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 9:49PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Snow showers will affect Buchanan...Northeastern Benton... Delaware and Northern Linn counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 947 PM CDT, snow showers were located along a line extending from near Lamont to Vinton. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Visibilities less than a quarter of a mile and due to snow and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Trained Spotter IMPACTS...Snow covered surfaces including roadways, bridges, overpasses, and sidewalks. Difficulty seeing while driving. Locations impacted include... Independence, Vinton, Manchester, Marion, Robins, Jesup, Center Point, Urbana, Central City, Fairbank, Springville, Edgewood, Winthrop, Hazleton, Earlville, Walker, Alburnett, Coggon, Quasqueton and Lamont. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 29 and 55. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
